Posts.Content: Sorry, it was a lump in her breast.
Posts.Title: Dr. In NYC?

Posts.Content: I am trying to find a recommendation for a friend who recently moved to NYC. She had her annual gynecology exam over Christmas and her doctor found a lump and told her to have a biopsy right away, and she had to go back to NYC the next day. She is looking for a doctor recommendation to get screened and follow-up with. Any recommendations?
Posts.Title: Dr. In NYC?
